name: 3DMark 11
description: Test your PC's performance with 3DMark, the world's most popular gaming benchmark and graphics test.
minimum_requirements: OS:Windows Vista Processor:1.8GHz dual-core Intel or AMD CPU Memory:1 GB RAM Graphics:DirectX 11 compatible Hard Drive:1 GB HD space

reviews.review_text: Well this program is quite usefull and it can be quite addicting in persuit of higher scores!
Non stop action, stunning scenario, dramatic and completely realistic story. Fantastic actor play! The best choice of 2012. Absolutely must buy. Highly recommend.
